pr_title: Added requester pays option to Mutect2 tasks that access bams

timeline.message:
Added requester pays option to Mutect2 tasks that access bams
gnomAD VCFs are not currently requester pays nor are they expected to be

timeline.bodyText: I don't think this is connected to anything.  Should this argument be used on line 152 and 154?
timeline.author: fleharty
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -128,6 +131,7 @@ task CreatePanel {
       File gnomad
       File gnomad_idx
       String? create_pon_extra_args
+      String? gcs_project_for_requester_pays

replies.bodyText: Indeed.  After I asked the gnomAD team and they said it's not, nor is it ever expected to be requester pays, I forgot to take this out.
replies.author: ldgauthier

timeline.message:
gnomAD isn't going to be requester pays, so we don't need that arg in
the CreatePanel task
